alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Union; Wayne (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN WAYNE, UNION AND FAYETTE COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL INDIANA THROUGH 230 PM EDT... At 144 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Connersville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph, half inch hail, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Connersville, Liberty, West College Corner, Salem, Waterloo, Columbia, Bunker Hill, Abington, Brownsville, Boston, Dunlapsville, Whitewater State Park, Goodwins Corner, Mettel Field, Cottage Grove, Springersville, Witts Station, Alquina, Charlottesville and Billingsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for southeastern Indiana. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
